tika-s0403t36:2_0: 36. Catutthassa pañcame attano guyhaṁ tassa āvikarotīti attano guyhaṁ nigguhituṁ
tika-s0403t36:2_1: yuttakathaṁ aññassa akathetvā tasseva ācikkhati. Tassa guyhaṁ aññesaṁ nācikkhatīti
tika-s0403t36:2_2: tena kathitaguyhaṁ yathā aññe na jānanti, evaṁ anāvikaronto chādeti.
tika-s0403t36:5_0: 37-42. Chaṭṭhe piyo ca hoti manāpo cāti kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Kalyāṇamitto
tika-s0403t36:5_1: hi saddhāsampanno ca hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno
tika-s0403t36:5_2: samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa sambodhiṁ
tika-s0403t36:5_3: kammañca kammaphalañca, tena sambodhiyā hetubhūtaṁ sattesu hitasukhaṁ na pariccajati
tika-s0403t36:5_4: . Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṁ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo.
tika-s0403t36:5_6: hoti. Cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho. Vīriyasampattiyā
tika-s0403t36:5_7: āraddhavīriyo hoti attahitaparahitapaṭipattiyaṁ. Satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassatī hoti.
tika-s0403t36:5_8: Samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto hoti samāhitacito. Paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṁ pajānāti.
tika-s0403t36:5_9: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṁ hitāhitaṁ
tika-s0403t36:5_10: yathābhūtaṁ jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahite nisedhetvā
tika-s0403t36:5_11: hite niyojeti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘piyo…pe… niyojetī’’ti. Sattamādīni uttānatthāni.
